org.drip.quant.common

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.common.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    StringUtil implements string utility functions. It exports the following functions: - Decompose + Transform string arrays into appropriate target type set/array/list, and vice versa - General-purpose String processor functions, such as GUID generator, splitter, type converter and input checker
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
